targetLine.text: Marty, let me see that photograph again.
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part III

contextBefore.text: Yeah, it's lovely Doc. Listen, we gotta load the DeLorean; we gotta get ready to roll, alright? Hey look at that, the tombstone.

contextAfter.text: Hey, that's great Doc! Don't you get it - we're goin' back to the future tomorrow, so everything's bein' erased!

But only my name is erased! The tombstone itself and the date still remain. That doesn't make sense. We know that this photograph represents what will happen if the events of today continue to run their course into tomorrow.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
